title: YBM HOME Magnetic Pencil Holder Wire Mesh Storage Basket Organizer with Strong Magnets Excellent for Whiteboard, Fridge and Locker Accessories, 1-Unit Medium
features: ORGANIZE AND HOLD - Our magnetic organizer has the perfect size and design to keep your desk and working space neat and organized. Clear up unbalanced energy clutter brings in your life. Put items in order with our magnetic storage basket organizers
MAGNETS ARE VERY STRONG - With 5 magnets on a strip are strong enough to attach to magnetic surfaces like the side of the fridge, wall lockers, whiteboard, and cubicle desk

PRACTICAL AND CONVENIENT - Our magnetic basket organizers are well made, handy and useful for holding essential writing supplies like dry erase markers on magnetic whiteboard, pens and pencils on the desktop, hold locker accessories, scissors, post it notes, and small kitchen items

STRONG AND STURDY DESIGN - These basket holders are made of stainless steel mesh with 5 strong magnets on a strip for optimal vertical storage. The wire mesh allows maximum airflow so dust and crumbs never accumulate
TWO SIZES AVAILABLE - We offer these magnetic basket holders in two sizes: medium and large. Medium size measures 4.5 in. L x 2 in. W x 3.5 in. H; Large size measures 6 in. L x 2 in. W x 3.5 in. H
description: Keep the essential items that would typically clutter up a desk held and at your fingertips with this magnetic mesh pencil holder organizer

These baskets are truly the organizational gadget for holding commonly-used writing supplies like markers, pens, post-it notes, notepads, pens, and pencils at a workstation in the office. It is versatile and convenient to keep cards, letters in a vertical position, coupons, receipts, and other small items arranged in your home. The magnets on the back panel are strong to attach to a magnetic surface such as the refrigerator, microwave, whiteboards, office desks, and lockers.
Magnetic baskets bring an end to the hassle of a chaotic desk and experience better workflow in your everyday projects and assignments.
Classic silver coated design made of solid quality mesh wire stainless steel with 5 strong magnets that endure reasonable weight.
